title: Ep 34: Ann Friedman and Aminatou Sow
itunes:title: Ep 34: Ann Friedman and Aminatou Sow
itunes:subtitle: These two need no introduction! The hosts of everyone’s favorite podcast, Call Your Girlfriend, and the authors of the new book, “Big Friendship” (order: https://bookshop.org/a/9875/9781982111908) join us to talk about their favorite recs and how they ...
description:
These two need no introduction! The hosts of everyone’s favorite podcast, Call Your Girlfriend, and the authors of the new book, “Big Friendship” (order: https://bookshop.org/a/9875/9781982111908) join us to talk about their favorite recs and how they shop for themselves and each other. 


(Follow Gee Thanks! on Insta: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod) 

(Follow Big Friendship on Insta: www.instagram.com/bigfriendshipbook) 


Ann goes deep on why a flexible measuring tape should be part of your shopping experience and Amina has Thoughts about washcloths and garbage cans. Also, buy their book, because it’s so wonderful!


Mentioned On This Episode!

  • Metal foot exfoliator: https://amzn.to/32w8NBw 
  • The Sleep Master: https://amzn.to/2WsmNsh 
  • Simple Human Trash Can: https://amzn.to/2ZzRjTh 
  • Flower Home Comforter: https://fave.co/3h7RF9y 
  • Casio Watch: https://amzn.to/32qAXhC 
  • Sewing Machine: https://amzn.to/2ZEmi0x 
  • Clothing Tape Measurer: https://amzn.to/39313Z0 
  • The Salux Washcloth: https://amzn.to/2OtgcJV 
  • Tushy Bidet: https://fave.co/32odUUz 
  • Butter Keeper: https://amzn.to/2DPECv3 
  • Iron on letters: https://amzn.to/2Wtynnb 
  • Buy Big Friendship: https://bookshop.org/a/9875/9781982111908 
  • Listen to Call Your Girlfriend: https://www.callyourgirlfriend.com/


Visit www.geethanksjustboughtit.com for even more recs!

Shop the Gee Thanks! Store: https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit


As always, reach me at Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com, @geethanksjustboughtitpod on Instagram, or leave me a message at 424-245-0736. 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
